title-group.article-title: Designing Expert Financial Systems: A Case Study of Corporate Credit Management

abstract.p: Designing expert systems for corporate financial management can be a major catalyst in efforts to increase real world usage of financial models. The article describes the development of an expert system prototype for credit granting in a Fortune 500 corporation. The system is currently undergoing extensive real time validation in several Fortune 500 firms.
